    • Binance

      public Binance(@Value("${binance.api.key}") String apiKey, @Value("${binance.api.secret}") String apiSecret)
      Initializes the Binance exchange with the given API key and secret. it also call manageWebSocketForUserEvent to listen to user events
      Parameters:

      apiSecret -

  • Method Details

    • getPriceForPair

      public BigDecimal getPriceForPair(Pair pair, Exchange exchange)
      Retrieves the price for a given pair from the Binance exchange.
      Specified by:
      getPriceForPair in interface ForExchangeCommunication
      Parameters:
      pair - the pair for which to retrieve the price
      exchange - the Binance exchange instance
      Returns:
      the price of a pair on a given exchange.
      Throws:
      BinanceDeserializerException - if there is an error deserializing the response from Binance

    • getBalanceForAsset

      public BigDecimal getBalanceForAsset(Asset asset, Exchange exchange) throws BinanceDeserializerException
      Retrieves the balance for a specific asset from the Binance exchange.
      Specified by:
      getBalanceForAsset in interface ForExchangeCommunication
      Parameters:
      asset - the asset for which to retrieve the balance
      exchange - the Binance exchange instance
      Returns:
      the balance of the asset as a BigDecimal, or null if the asset is not found
      Throws:
      BinanceDeserializerException - if there is an error deserializing the response from Binance

    • getOrderInfo

      Parameters:

      Returns:
